readable.title: 2239938351_43c73c887c
readable.content: A big black dog carries a blue ball while two Corgis run at his side . A black doberman , a brown and white corgi and a black , brown and white corgi play with a blue ball on the grass . Three dogs , one of whom has a blue ball . Three dogs on grass , one with a blue ball in its mouth . Three dogs playing with a blue ball .
